name: Greedy Guns
description: Greedy Guns is a joyful, color-filled platformer that sprinkles elements of exploration on top of excruciating challenges.Inspired by classic shooters like Gunstar Heroes, Metal Slug, and Contra, Greedy Guns brings the run-and-gun formula into the 21st Century!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
